column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Update: Â One of our absolute favorite places anywhere. Great environment
column3: the total package. Visited again last night and had our favorite waiter Brandon. Appetizers were tomato with bacon (if this isn't the best bacon anywhere tell me) and a smoked trout Caesar salad. We share the Chicago cut steak and the lamb T bone
column4: both perfectly cooked and delicious. Side dishes were the corn (also the best anywhere) and spinach. Although we were all full
column5: the chocolate cream pie disappeared in moments.
